sentences.sentence: Migraines occur when inflammation around the brain triggers trigeminal nociceptors-cells responsible for pain sensations around the face-to transmit chemical signals.
sentences.translation: 当大脑附近的炎症触发三叉神经伤害感受器(对面部疼痛作出反应的细胞)来传递化学信号时，偏头痛就发作了。

sentences.sentence: Here we show that charged sodium-channel blockers can be targeted into nociceptors by the application of TRPV1 agonists to produce a pain-specific local anaesthesia.
sentences.translation: 结果显示，应用TRPV 1激动剂能够使带电的钠通道阻断剂特异性地作用于疼痛感受器神经元而产生特异性局麻止痛效果。
